entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this morning. A few showers beginning late this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h this morning. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. A few showers beginning late this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
